caption.p: Microphotographs (40×) obtained in fluorescence microscopy and dyed with Calcofluor-white stain (( B, E, H), λ = 360 nm) and propidium iodide (( C, F, I), λ = 536 nm). Visible light ( A, D, G). ( A– C) shows the control, while ( D– F) are the yeasts exposed to essential oil (10 mg/mL) for 2 h. ( G– I) show the yeasts exposed to essential oil (2 mg/mL) for 2 h.
